title: Update Firebase authDomain to use yourdomain.com

requirements.summary: Update authDomain in firebaseConfig to 'yourdomain.com' while preserving all other configuration values and exports
acceptanceCriteria: The authDomain field in firebaseConfig in frontend/src/firebase.ts is set to 'yourdomain.com'.
All other firebaseConfig values remain unchanged.
All existing exports (auth, RecaptchaVerifier, signInWithPhoneNumber) remain intact and functional.
The app builds without errors after the change.

file_operations.description: Update the authDomain field in the firebaseConfig object to 'yourdomain.com'. Preserve all other firebaseConfig fields (apiKey, projectId, storageBucket, messagingSenderId, appId, measurementId) and all existing exports (auth instance, RecaptchaVerifier, signInWithPhoneNumber) without modification.
